## Tickets and T&CS

::: {.grid .column-screen-inset}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7}
- Our workshops are delivered by [our trainer Charlotte Hadley](#meet-our-trainer)

- We run in-person and online workshops.
    
    - Online workshops are hosted via Zoom.

    - In-person workshops will also provide accessibility information.

- Some of our workshops are **limited to 6 people**. This means our instructor Charlotte can focus on you and your questions. Why 6? It's an [R Easter Egg](https://forum.posit.co/t/why-does-head-show-6-rows-by-default/3259/5).

- Tickets are sold via the [**awesome** Ticket Tailor service](https://www.tickettailor.com/events/graphplotchartdatastory). They're an environmentally friendly B Corp. Consider switching to them yourself!

- Unless otherwise stated in your ticket, we have a [default refunds policy](data-ethics_t-and-cs.html#ticket-refund-policy).
:::
